name: Color Picker
description: HSV/HSL/HEX color picker with popovers, eye dropper, and history controls.

use: you need a full color picker UI.
you want multiple color modes and alpha control.
avoid: you only need a compact field (use `color_input`).

patterns.title: HSV mode with alpha
patterns.code:
ColorPicker(
  value: ColorDerivative.fromColor(Colors.teal),
  initialMode: ColorPickerMode.hsv,
  showAlpha: true,
)

theming: `ColorPickerTheme` controls spacing, typography, and layout defaults.
accessibility: Provide labels for sliders and inputs when used in forms.
dont: Hide alpha controls when transparency matters.
